userStories.title: Create directory structure for tacoma_world_builds
acceptanceCriteria: Create urls.json with empty urls array
userStories.notes: New output directory to separate from old /media/ scrape

userStories.title: Analyze TacomaWorld site structure for build threads
acceptanceCriteria: Find pagination patterns for thread listings
Document URL patterns: /threads/ for builds, /garages/ for showcases
userStories.notes: IMPORTANT: Target /threads/ and /garages/ ONLY. Ignore /media/ pages - they have no mod data.

userStories.title: Discover all build thread URLs
acceptanceCriteria: Scrape build journal forum sections for thread URLs
Save URLs incrementally to urls.json (every 20 URLs)
userStories.notes: Look for: Build Journals, Project Threads, Garage entries. TacomaWorld has forums like '3rd Gen Tacomas' with build threads.

userStories.title: Verify URL count and update sources.json
acceptanceCriteria: Verify all discovered URLs are /threads/ or /garages/ (not /media/)
Update sources.json with expectedUrls and urlsFound
userStories.notes: Quality check: If any /media/ URLs found, remove them.
